DOC.brief_summary: This non-randomized , single group , open-label study investigate mass balance , rout elimination , pharmacokinetics , metabolism single oral dose RO5424802 pharmacokinetics 14C-labeled tracer healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: A Study Elimination , Pharmacokinetics , Metabolism RO5424802
DOC.criteria: Male adult , 18 45 year age , inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 , inclusive Willingness use effective contraception outline protocol Willingness abstain alcohol xanthinecontaining beverage food ( coffee , tea , cola , chocolate `` energy drink '' ) 72 hour prior first dose discharged Willingness avoid prolong sun exposure guard sunburn study & followup Clinically significant medical history finding physical examination , vital sign , laboratory test result prior study start Positive screening test hepatitis B C , HIV , alcohol , drug abuse , tobacco Regular smoking within 6 month prior first dose . Subjects avoid smoky environment least 1 week prior cotinine screen Excessive alcohol consumption Use metabolic inducer ( include herbal St. John 's Wort ) within 4 week 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) first dose study medication , include limited : rifampin , rifabutin , glucocorticoid , carbamazepine , phenytoin phenobarbital Regular work ionize radiation radioactive material Subjects enrol previous radiolabel study receive radiotherapy within 12 month prior first dose total radioactivity 12 month period would exceed acceptable radiation burden > 0.1 mSv Exposure radiation diagnostic reason ( except dental Xrays plain Xrays thorax bony skeleton [ exclude spinal column ] ) , work participation medical trial previous year Strenuous activity , sunbathing , contact sport allow 4 day prior entry clinical site study followup Participation investigational drug device study within 60 day ( 6 month biologic therapy ) prior first dosing
